example.text: With 2023 on the horizon, I look back on 2022 and I'm incredibly proud of the things we accomplished - together - for Arizona. I invite you to click here for a recap of 2022, or you may download the PDF by visiting my website at .

The American Federation of Teachers supports this legislation and calls for swift passage.” – American Federation of Teachers President Randi Weingarten “I started my career as an educator and as I prepare for my retirement, I am relieved knowing that the last piece of legislation I introduced in Congress will support our nation’s educators, and I am hopeful that my colleagues will continue the work to support our nation’s teachers and school staff,” said Rep. Kirkpatrick. The bill text can be found here and a one-pager here.
